Mask Demo

Fade Scroll uses CSS masks to blend seamlessly with any background.

Horizontal Fade Scroller

The CSS can be changed to use linear gradients for better compatibility if the background is a solid color.

Hidden Scrollbars

To hide the scrollbar, set hideScrollbar: true in the options.

Horizontal

Horizontal Fade Scroller

Vertical

Vertical Fade Scroller

But how to scroll sideways without a visible scrollbar? Some input devices come with a mechanism to scroll sideways — otherwise the “usual” way to scroll sideways is by holding the Shift key while spinning the mouse wheel, but there is another way…

Sideways Scrolling with Mouse Wheel

Users may prefer to scroll sideways by using the mouse wheel normally, especially when the scrollbar is not visible. To enable this behaviour, set captureWheel: true in the options. This will translate mouse wheel movement to horizontal scrolling.
